directions: Trim fennel stalks flush with bulb and discard stalks. Quarter bulbs lengthwise, then cut lengthwise into paper-thin slices with mandoline.
Toss fennel with remaining ingredients in a large bowl.
ingredients: 4 plum tomatoes (1/2 pound total), seeded and thinly sliced lengthwise
1/2 teaspoon finely grated fresh lemon zest
1 to 1 1/2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice (to taste)
Special equipment: a mandoline or other adjustable-blade slicer
title: Fennel, Tomato, and Feta Salad
